item.title: Lien Finance: The Global Internet of Value Movement Will Require a Truly Decentralized Independent Dollar (iDOL)
item.description: It is with great pleasure to announce that Based.Ventures has led the 5 million USD investment round into Lien Protocol alongside other top tier investors like FTX. We take a look at the advantages Lien Protocol offers over existing solutions.
